column5: (Adds details on volume  quote  Google  Amazon  Microsoft up after the bell)     * Nasdaq tops March 10  2000  high of 5 048.62     * S&P 500 hits intraday record high     * Indexes: Dow up 0.11 pct  S&P up 0.24 pct  Nasdaq up 0.41 pct      By Caroline Valetkevitch     April 23 The Nasdaq Composite  the U.S. market index most closely associated with technology stocks  closed at an all-time high on Thursday  surpassing a 2000 record set just before the dotcom crash. column4: Factbox: Nasdaq's 'Cubes' ETF reaps Nasdaq's big run
column5: The Nasdaq's alter ego  the PowerShares QQQ fund  has been the go-to exchange-traded fund for individual investors  pension funds  foreign insurers  sovereign wealth funds  and just about anyone else who has ever had the desire to tap technology sector growth for a quick trade or a long hold.

column4: Microsoft profit  revenue beats Wall Street view; shares up
column5: Microsoft Corp on Thursday reported revenue and profit above Wall Street expectations  as sales of its hardware and cloud-computing services helped to offset a decline in the company's core Windows business.
